types.name: No Pork
types.description: Eliminating pork and pork products in the diet which may be due to religious practices and/or food preferences

types.name: No Red Meat
types.description: Eliminating pork and beef in the diet

types.name: No Dark Colored Foods
types.description: Eliminating all foods/drinks colored red, brown or black, red meat, spicy and oily, which may affect the color of the stools and the vomitus.

types.name: G6PD Deficiency
types.description: Diet eliminating fava beans, red wine, legumes (abitsuelas, garbanzos, kadyos, munggo), blueberry, soya food (taho, tokwa, soy sauce), tonic water and bitter melon/ampalaya in the diet

types.name: Hypo-allergenic
types.description: Individualized diet based on the specific food allergies. Common allergens are chicken, egg, fish, seafood, nuts, soya products, milk/dairy products and spices such as celery, garlic, cinnamon, sesame, turmeric, onion, mustard, vanilla and black pepper
